item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order Datatype Description Single storage group(array) used for a hardware server order. If a raid configuration is required this object will describe a single array that will be configured on the server. If the server requires more than one array, a storage group will need to be created for each array. Local arrayNumber Type: integer arraySize Type: decimal
